The Russian Godfathers - Part 1 - The Fugitive (2005) TVRip

Broadcast a year before the Litvinenko murder, this fascinating series lifted the lid on the struggle that still continues between Putin, and his advesaries, the Russian Oligarchs.

The first part follows exile and Litvenenko associate Boris Berezovsky as he campaigns to fight Putin in the Media and along Russia&#039;s borders. Under threat of arrest, Berezovsky travels to revolutionary Ukraine for the campaign to elect Yuschenko.




The Russian Godfathers - Part 2 - The Prisoner (2005) TVRip

This part follows the trial and conviction of Russia&#039;s richest man, Mikhail Khodorkovsky.
Khodorkovsky&#039;s grinning face was famously beamed across the world from behind the bars of the court&#039;s cage, and this episode reveals the tactics that Putin used to suppress the oil baron and separate him from his company and wealth.




The Russian Godfathers - Part 3 - The Politician (2005) TVRip

Final part in the formidable series on Putin&#039;s fight with the oligarchs. Shot a year before the murder of Litvinenko, this film examines Putin&#039;s fight with the only serious rival for the presidency,Yuri Luzhkov.The crew follow Luzhkov, the renegade billionnaire Mayor of Moscow as he takes the fight to Putin.
This is a fascinating film which shows both the ruthless methods in which Putin crushes his opposition and the extreme corruption that exist at the highest levels of Russian government.
